full_text: @niedsonjradv @BLOGdoPEPE I kit COVID, pasmem, ainda está sendo receitado a torto e à direita, em grande parte do centro-norte, centro-oeste e alguns lugarejos do Sul. Posso provar: minha tia de Tocantins, estando agora com COVID, levou receita de invermectina e cloroquina pra casa, dada por médico do SUS

texto_en: @niedsonjradv @blogdopepe i covid kit, amazingly, it's still being prescribed left and right, in most of the north-central, mid-west and some places in the south. I can prove it: my aunt from tocantins, now with covid, took a prescription for invermectin and chloroquine home, given by a doctor from sus
